have-submitted-application.header: Have you already submitted an application?

liveapp-or-decision.header: Have you been given a decision?

how-to-apply.header: Apply to stay in the UK after it leaves the EU

decision-factsheet.header: You should get a decision on your application within three weeks of applying.

contact-information.intro: We will use these contact details to confirm we've received your enquiry and to contact you if we require more information.

contact-method-preference.header: How would you prefer to be contacted?
contact-method-preference.intro: We may contact you by email or phone depending on your enquiry.

unique-reference-number.header: What is your Unique Reference Number?
unique-reference-number.intro: This is also called Home Office Case ID
